3.title: Text widget
3.text: If you’re coming to any of the upcoming shows in India, Australia and New Zealand and there’s a song you’d like to hear, then we’d love you to send us your request video. Upload your video to Instagram with the name of your chosen song as a hashtag PLUS the appropriate show hashtag from below. Please tag @Artist too. If you’re going to a show in a city which has more than one show, please also tell us which date you’re going to.
